| HistoryText             = 

The Monitor Team was a six person team of [[United States Hulk Operations (Earth-616)|Shadow Base]] agents tasked with monitoring the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] and his allies through the use of remote viewing.{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 6}}

After Shadow Base commander [[Reginald Fortean (Earth-616)|Gen. Fortean]] bonded with [[Gamma-Activated Tissue]] and went insane, the head of the science division [[Charlene McGowan (Earth-616)|Dr. Charlene McGowan]] relieved him of his duty, a decision the Monitors agreed with.{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 24}} Half the Monitors eventually left when the Hulk himself assumed control of Shadow Base.{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 26}}

| Equipment               = '''Ocular Implants:''' Each member of the Monitor team wore electronic implants in their eyes that allowed them to psychically spy on people even if they're in space.{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 22}} The implants, and by extension the Monitors, could be blocked through mystical means. [[Elizabeth Ross (Earth-616)|Betty Ross]] successfully blocked a Monitor with a small idol of [[Ikonn (Earth-616)|Ikonn]].{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 14}}
